SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI

Class AppClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.AppClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppClientRMI, AppClientSocket
public abstract class AppClient extends Object
The AppClient class represents the player as a user in a client/server application pattern. It contains everything necessary in order to play to this game such as notification to the match server, UX/UI methods reference, view management ect...

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    AppClient.UIType
    The UIType represents the type of UI implemented in MyShelfie: CLI - Command Line Interface GUI - Graphical User Interface

    • checkIp

      public static boolean checkIp(String ip)
      method that check if the given string is in the form x.x.x.x with x in [0, 255] inclusive.
      Parameters:
      ip - - the string to be checked
      Returns:
      true iff String ip -> is an ip string type

    • logginToAppServer

      protected static boolean logginToAppServer(AppClient.UIType uiType, AppServer appS, ServerStub stub) throws RemoteException
      method that checks if the nickname is already taken, if not so it registers the client to the server
      Parameters:
      uiType - the type of the chosen UI
      appS - the match Server App
      stub - the corresponding ServerStub
      Returns:
      true iff the user nickname is accepted
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of log method call goes wrong
